chapter.title: Pegasus Walkthrough
chapter.para: We use a walkthrough of a sample project to demonstrate how Pegasus quickly and easily create, execute, and monitor workflows. The sample project runs on a VM environment and uses basic workflows. The sample project is relaviely simple,with links to more information on how to create more complex project components. We also include links to terms and concepts as they arise.
